title: The Next Phase (with Neil O'Brien MP)
itunes:title: The Next Phase (with Neil O'Brien MP)
description:
The government is expected to unveil its plans this week for lifting the U.K. lockdown. Iain Anderson of Cicero/AMO joins Bloomberg Westminster's Roger Hearing and Sebastian Salek to discuss what the next phase could look like.

But first, Neil O'Brien, Conservative MP for Harborough, Oadby & Wigston, tells us about an unsung issue of the lockdown: loneliness.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
